subScenes.name: 开场寒暄
subScenes.description: 双方礼貌问候，建立融洽氛围

qaPairs.speakerText: Nice to finally meet you in person, John. How's the trip been?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 终于当面见到你了，约翰，旅途还顺利吗？

responses.text: It's been great, thanks! The flight was smooth and the hotel's fantastic.
responses.text_cn: 非常顺利，谢谢！航班很顺，酒店也很棒。

responses.text: Not bad! A little tired, but excited to get into the talks.
responses.text_cn: 还行，有点累，但很期待开始谈判。

responses.text: Fine.
responses.text_cn: 还行。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用细节回应寒暄，展现积极态度

qaPairs.speakerText: I hope we can make this a productive session — maybe even a long-term partnership.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 希望今天能高效推进，甚至建立长期合作。

responses.text: Absolutely — we’ve got a lot of shared goals, and I’m confident we can align on them.
responses.text_cn: 当然，我们的目标高度一致，我相信能达成共识。

responses.text: Yeah, I think so too — let’s keep things open and flexible.
responses.text_cn: 我也这么觉得，咱们保持灵活吧。

responses.text: Sure.
responses.text_cn: 好的。

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达合作意愿，避免机械回应

subScenes.name: 价格分歧
subScenes.description: 客户提出低价要求，供应商委婉拒绝

qaPairs.speakerText: We really need to bring the unit price down to $45 — our budget’s tight this quarter.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们真得把单价降到45美元，本季度预算很紧。

responses.text: I totally get that, but at $45, we’d be operating at a loss — our quality standards won’t allow it.
responses.text_cn: 我理解，但45美元我们会亏本，质量标准不允许。

responses.text: That’s a bit low — maybe we can look at volume discounts instead?
responses.text_cn: 有点低，不如考虑按量打折？

responses.text: No way.
responses.text_cn: 不可能。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用理由+替代方案婉拒，避免硬碰硬

qaPairs.speakerText: What if we commit to 10,000 units instead of 5,000? Could you budge on price then?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果我们承诺采购一万件，而不是五千件，价格能调整吗？

responses.text: That’s a strong offer — we could do $48 for 10K, with free shipping and extended warranty.
responses.text_cn: 这是个有力提议，一万件我们可以给48美元，包邮加延保。

responses.text: Hmm, maybe $47 if you sign a 12-month contract?
responses.text_cn: 嗯，如果签一年合同，47美元可以考虑。

responses.text: We'll think about it.
responses.text_cn: 我们考虑一下。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用附加条件换取价格让步，创造双赢

subScenes.name: 条款协商
subScenes.description: 讨论付款方式与交付周期，寻求折中方案

qaPairs.speakerText: We usually pay 50% upfront — but this time, we’d prefer 30% with the rest after delivery.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们通常付50%预付款，这次希望能改成30%+交货后付尾款。

responses.text: We can do 30% upfront if you agree to a 15-day payment window after delivery — that’s our standard.
responses.text_cn: 可以接受30%预付款，但交货后15天内必须付清，这是我们的标准。

responses.text: How about 35% upfront and net-10 after shipment? We need some cash flow.
responses.text_cn: 35%预付，发货后10天结清如何？我们也要现金流。

responses.text: We can't do less than 50%.
responses.text_cn: 不能低于50%。

qaPairs.usageNote: 提出对等条件，避免单方面让步

qaPairs.speakerText: Our warehouse can only handle 2,000 units per week — can you split the shipment?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们的仓库每周最多处理2000件，能分批交货吗？

responses.text: Sure — we can ship 2K weekly over 5 weeks, with no extra charge.
responses.text_cn: 没问题，每周发2000件，持续五周，不加价。

responses.text: We’d need a 5% surcharge for split shipments — it messes with our logistics.
responses.text_cn: 分批发货要加5%，会打乱我们的物流安排。

responses.text: We'll try.
responses.text_cn: 我们试试。

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确附加成本或无附加条件，清晰表达底线

subScenes.name: 达成共识
subScenes.description: 确认最终条款，表达合作期待

qaPairs.speakerText: So to confirm: $48/unit, 10K units, 30% upfront, split shipments, 12-month contract?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 确认一下：单价48美元，一万件，30%预付，分批交货，签一年合同？

responses.text: Exactly — that’s the deal. I’ll send the contract by EOD, and we’ll schedule the first shipment next Monday.
responses.text_cn: 没错，就这样。我今天下班前发合同，首批发货安排下周一。

responses.text: Sounds good — looking forward to working together!
responses.text_cn: 没问题，期待合作！

responses.text: Okay.
responses.text_cn: 好的。

qaPairs.usageNote: 复述条款并明确下一步，避免误解

qaPairs.speakerText: We’re really glad we could find common ground — this could be the start of something big.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 很高兴我们找到了共识，这可能是大合作的开始。

responses.text: Same here — your team’s flexible and professional. Let’s keep the momentum going.
responses.text_cn: 我也是，你们团队灵活专业，咱们保持势头。

responses.text: Yeah, hope so. Let’s touch base in a month.
responses.text_cn: 是啊，希望如此，一个月后再联系。

responses.text: Thanks.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体赞美强化关系，非泛泛而谈

subScenes.name: 礼貌道别
subScenes.description: 结束谈判，约定后续联系

qaPairs.speakerText: I’ll have the contract emailed to you by 5 PM today — feel free to call if anything’s unclear.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 合同今天下午5点前发你邮箱，有疑问随时打电话。

responses.text: Perfect — I’ll review it first thing tomorrow. Thanks for your patience and flexibility!
responses.text_cn: 太好了，我明天一早就审阅，感谢你的耐心与灵活！

responses.text: Got it. Talk soon.
responses.text_cn: 收到，回头聊。

responses.text: Okay.
responses.text_cn: 好的。

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达行动承诺，体现专业与主动性

qaPairs.speakerText: Safe travels back — and again, thanks for coming all the way here.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 回程一路平安，再次感谢你专程赶来。

responses.text: Thanks! I’ll keep you posted on the contract review — and I hope we’ll meet again soon.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！我会及时反馈合同审核，希望很快再见面。

responses.text: Appreciate it. See you next time.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢，下次见。

responses.text: Bye.
responses.text_cn: 再见。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用未来期待收尾，留下积极印象
